content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm open to negotiation. What price do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to pay x Euro. Is that acceptable?

Also, I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. I'm also responsible and dependable, so I'm sure I'll pay my rent on time.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can do to make the rental agreement more appealing to you.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
Thank you for your offer, x Euro. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for my property. That being said, I am open to negotiating.

As for your qualifications as a tenant, I do appreciate your honesty about being a student on a tight budget. However, I would like to see some references to confirm your reliability and ability to pay rent on time. Is there anything else you can provide to help me make my decision?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can provide you with references from previous landlords. Would that help?

Also, I'm willing to provide you with my student ID to verify my status as a student.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can do to help.

Thank you for your time. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
Thank you for offering references from previous landlords. That would be helpful in making my decision. Additionally, your student ID would also be useful in verifying your status as a student.

I appreciate your willingness to provide all of this information. However, as a landlord, I am also looking for the best possible rental price for my property. I would like to see a higher offer than x Euro in order to consider your proposal.

If you are willing to increase your offer, please let me know. Otherwise, I am sorry to say that I must decline your proposal at this time. Thank you for your interest in my apartment, and I wish you the best of luck in your search.
name: Heinrich Heine
